page.title: 04THE LOWESTOFT LIBRARY
page.content: The Library is one of our main sources of information in the Lowestoft Community. On the first floor there is a Lecture Theatre, cafe and a Reference Section. On the ground floor is the Chidren's library and an Adults' fiction section. The library is all computerised, and has a lift going up to the first floor. Usually, in the children's part they display many pieces of Art Work from schools around the area. In the Adults' section you can hire videos, as well as books. More recently, a computer software lending service has been set up. The library also owns a Mobile Library which goes around to schools supplying them with books in order to keep school resourses up to date and interesting for the pupils.
